enumerations.name: FloatEnum
enumerations.note: This enumerator specifies the policy how an objects floats on a page. Aggregated by MultiLanguageVerbatim.float, Table.float

literals.name: float
literals.description:
This indicates that a page formatter is allowed to float the table to optimize the pagination. This is for example supported by TeX.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: noFloat
literals.description:
This indicates that a page formatter is not allowed to float the object to optimize the pagination.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

enumerations.name: FrameEnum
enumerations.note: This enumerator specifies the policy, where to place a frame border around the table. Aggregated by MlFigure.frame, Table.frame

literals.name: all
literals.description:
Borders all around the table
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: bottom
literals.description:
Border at the bottom of the table
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: none
literals.description:
No borders around the table
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=2

literals.name: sides
literals.description:
Borders at the sides of the table
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=3

literals.name: top
literals.description:
Border at the top of the table
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=4

literals.name: topbot
literals.description:
Borders at the top and bottom of the table
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=5

enumerations.name: AlignEnum
enumerations.note: This enumerator specifies horizontal alignment. Aggregated by Colspec.align, Entry.align, Tgroup.align

literals.name: center
literals.description:
The content of the table is horizontally centered.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: justify
literals.description:
This indicates that the content of table cell shall be justified (rendered as a block where white-space is expanded such that all lines are filled up).
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: leftright
literals.description:
This indicates that the content of a table cell is left justified.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=3

enumerations.name: ValignEnum
enumerations.note: This enumerator specifies vertical alignment. Aggregated by Entry.valign, Row.valign, Tbody.valign

literals.name: bottom
literals.description:
The contents of the table cell is bottom aligned.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: middle
literals.description:
The contents of the table is vertically centered.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: top
literals.description:
The contents of the table cell is top aligned.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=2

enumerations.name: PgwideEnum
enumerations.note: This enumerator specifies, if the table shall be rendered across the entire page, even if it is placed in side-head layouts. Aggregated by MlFigure.pgwide, MultiLanguageVerbatim.pgwide

literals.name: noPgwide
literals.description:
This indicates that the table shall be fit in the current text flow.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: pgwide
literals.description:
This indicates that the table may use the entire page width. This is in particular important in case of so called "side-head layouts" but also if the table is in a list or in a note.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1
